product_name: Brunton F-Nomad V2 Digital Compass - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Great for adventure racing, backpacking or just a meander through the woods, the Brunton F-Nomad V2 Digital compass keeps you on course during all your backcountry adventures. Large digital display offers an easy read of your bearings: backlit digital display is easy to read in low-light conditions. Programmable digital compass gives a bearing to 1-degree accuracy; adjustable declination for fine-tuned local accuracy. Forward and reverse bearings provide accurate direction of travel. Also shows temperature in Celsius or Fahrenheit and features a clock, calendar and alarm. Built-in bubble level offers +/- 2deg of accuracy. Features a low-battery indicator; includes one CR2032 3V lithium battery and a neck/wrist lanyard. Closeout.
short_description: Great for adventure racing, backpacking or just a meander through the woods, the Brunton F-Nomad V2 Digital compass keeps you on course during all your backcountry adventures.
